select count(*) from MEMBER
where id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where out_flag = '0'
where out_flag = '1'

select ID, NAME, TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as JOIN_DATE, OUT_FLAG from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY JOIN_DATE DESC) as rnum, ID, NAME, JOIN_DATE, OUT_FLAG from MEMBER
where id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where out_flag = '0'
where out_flag = '1'
ORDER BY OUT_FLAG ASC , JOIN_DATE DESC )
WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}

select m.NAME, m.EMAIL, m.ID, TO_CHAR(m.JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as JOIN_DATE, m.PHONE, m.ZIPCODE, m.ADDR, m.DE_ADDR, m.OUT_FLAG, mo.OUT_REASON, TO_CHAR(mo.OUT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as OUT_DATE from MEMBER m, MEMBER_OUT mo where m.ID=mo.ID(+) AND m.ID=#{id}
